column3: Looks pretty good.  Please use bool for boolean choices (example: gettxout).  ACK if that is fixed.\n

Agree with @jgarzik. ACK otherwise.

EDIT: hmm, it seems getrawtransaction uses 0/1 for verbose... meh

Indeed... Boolean does make more sense, but usually consistency wins so far. Otherwise, we should be using Satoshi values everywhere...

@jgarzik Any further thoughts? Agree/disagree?
Be consistent with gettxout, and use a boolean/get_bool()...  :)\n
